description: Chocolates in Korea celebrate love, punning on 'Seoul-mates' for Valentine's.
title: Seoul-mates
n_1: Choco and Cocoa wander Seoul's streets, excited for Valentine's.
c2_1: “Yes, it's the city of love for chocolates like us!”
n_2: They admire a heart-shaped landmark, symbolizing love.
c1_2: “Look, even the city is in love!”
n_3: Sharing a moment, they feel the love in the air.
n_4: Under the night sky, their love shines as bright as Seoul.
c1_4: “Cocoa, will you be my Seoul-mate forever?”
c2_4: “Always, Choco. Our love is eternal like Seoul.”
